I work with Likert survey data. This [article](https://kaioinformatics.netlify.app/blog/2022-11-12-what-s-a-wilcoxon-signed-rank-test/) is a good reminder to be using this test even when it feels like you are working with real numbers.

A good question to consider is if I could make a graph like those in the post with more than 2 variables?
